title: Siphon

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Siphon power from someone every night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> If your target has a limited use ability, you will steal a charge, letting you use the ability once. If your target is evil, you will instead copy a charge, letting you use their ability once but not taking a charge from the target. You will also be told they are evil (evil meaning against the Town).

> If your target does not have a limited use ability, roleblock them the current night and the next night. If your target is evil, you will only roleblock them the current night. You will also be told they are evil (evil meaning against the Town).

> Roleblock Immunity.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Have the good faction lose (this can win while dead).

desc:
Post 1431
*"These townsfolk can't be trusted with such powers, I'll relieve this person of their power..."*
*Siphon has revealed themselves as the Mayor!*
